underwrite.translation[0].definitions[0]: to support an activity, business plan etc with money, and to take financial responsibility if it fails
The government has agreed to underwrite the project with a grant of £5 million.
underwrite.translation[0].definitions[1]: if an insurance company underwrites an insurance contract, it agrees to pay for any damage or loss that happens
underwrite.translation[0].definitions[2]: to arrange to sell shares to investors, and to agree to buy any which are not bought by them
